messages.alphaDash: Must contain letters, dashes, or underscores only.
messages.alphaNum: Must contain letters and numbers only.
messages.alphaSpaces: Must contain letters and spaces only.
messages.alphaNumSpaces: Must contain letters, numbers, and spaces only.
messages.greaterEqual: Must be greater than or equal to {num}.
messages.lessEqual: Must be less than or equal to {num}.
messages.greaterEqualTo: Must be greater than or equal to {num}.
messages.lessEqualTo: Must be less than or equal to {num}.
messages.minDate: Date must be on or after {date}.
messages.maxDate: Date must be on or before {date}.
messages.ext: File extension must be one of: {allowed}.
messages.mimes: File type must be one of: {allowed}.
messages.minWidth: Image width must be at least {width}px.
messages.minHeight: Image height must be at least {height}px.
messages.maxSelect: Please select no more than {num} options.
messages.min: Value must be greater than or equal to {min}.
messages.max: Value must be less than or equal to {max}.
messages.step: Please enter a valid value. The two nearest valid values are {prev} and {next}.
messages.minlength: Please lengthen this text to {maxlength} characters or more (you are currently using {curLength} characters).
messages.maxlength: Please shorten this text to no more than {maxlength} characters (you are currently using {curLength} characters).
messages.strong: Password must be 8+ chars, with upper, lower, number & symbol.
